title: Spelling mistake when examining Hextech Sweeper on Twisted Treeline.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/92GfuEs.jpg?1
Currently: ...Grants vision in the area target area for 5 seconds, revealing** traps enemy champions** that enter....
Should be: ...Grants vision in the target area for 5 seconds, revealing **traps and enemy champions** that enter...

replies.body: You added an extra area there. First I thought that was the problem and then I kept reading.
